channel.title: example on Sambid Wasti
channel.description: Recent content in example on Sambid Wasti

item.description: Research Experience Postdoc Researcher 2020 - present* Catholic University of America, Washington, DC NASA Goddard Space Flight Center, Greenbelt, MD Center for Research and Exploration in Space Science & Technology II , Greenbelt, MD Postdoc researcher at CUA, working at NASA Goddard under CRESST2 cooperative agreement. I am part of the team to develop ComPair telescope, a prototype of AMEGO. AMEGO is a midex mission concept. Additional information about AMEGO. ComPair (and AMEGO) uses four subsystem to achieve its scientific and instrument goals.
